ai-ne8:1.1_0: Herein, what is the characteristic of impermanence?
ai-ne8:1.4_0: They have spoken of oneness in one different things, they are spoken of.
ai-ne8:2.1_0: “Mendicants, the eye of the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-ne8:2.2_0: When this is said, the interior sense fields are said to be far from the eye.
ai-ne8:2.4_0: all the internal characteristics of the sense spheres have one characteristic.
ai-ne8:3.1_0: “Rādha, if you take pleasure in form, let alone those who don’t look for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding form, letting go of Māra and Brahmā.”
ai-ne8:3.2_0: When this aggregates are said to be the constituents (of mind and body),
ai-ne8:3.4_0: all the characteristics including the senses by one who deals with the five characteristics, etc., are stated in this way.
ai-ne8:4.3_0: don’t cultivate what should not be done,
ai-ne8:4.4_0: but always do what should be done.”
ai-ne8:5.1_0: Thus mindfulness of the body are called “mindfulness” and the mind is spoken of as a state that is incompatible with mindfulness occupied with the body and the mind.
ai-ne8:5.2_0: whatever is seen or heard is spoken by.
ai-ne8:6.1_0: “In that case, mendicant, meditates by observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.”
ai-ne8:6.2_0: “Skilled in energy,” “The faculties of mindfulness, in contemplates the faculties of energy, mindfulness, and situational awareness are fully developed.
ai-ne8:6.3_0: What is the oneness with the characteristic of enduring the four faculties?
ai-ne8:7.1_0: The four kinds of mindfulness meditation are developed and cultivated. They are fully developed: the four kinds of mindfulness meditation, the four right efforts, the four bases of psychic power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven awakening factors, and the noble eightfold path. They are fully developed. And the seven awakening factors are fully developed.
ai-ne8:7.2_0: For all the characteristics of awakening are fully developed because they have the characteristic of the Bodhisatta-Tree of Awakening.
ai-ne8:8.1_0: Thoughts that are unprofitable for the meaning and results of them.
ai-ne8:8.2_0: And the four kinds of mindfulness meditation are given up and come to an end.
ai-ne8:9.1_0: Or wherever the faculty of sight is taught, the visible-form element vanished right there.
ai-ne8:9.2_0: Or where there is the faculty of pleasure, happiness is the noble truth of the origin of suffering, and the noble truth of the origin of suffering.
ai-ne8:9.4_0: Or wherever neither-unpleasant-nor-pleasant feeling is taught, all of them dependent origination.
ai-ne8:9.5_0: For what reason is it an underlying tendency for ignorance underlies that.
ai-ne8:9.6_0: ignorance is a condition for choices. Name and form are a condition for consciousness. Name and form are conditions for the six sense fields. The six sense fields are conditions for contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving. Craving is a condition for grasping. Grasping is a condition for continued existence. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth. Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, for grief, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
ai-ne8:9.7_0: That fame is to be removed from passion, frightening with the defilements of defilement, deceitfulness obstinately stick to the tradition.
ai-ne8:10.1_0: When they have this one characteristic, they say: the certain things as their ascetic life and the characteristic of the death and they are different things produced in them.
ai-ne8:10.2_0: Hence it is said: “Hasn’t you live in the Dhamma alone?”
